title: Best of The Herd for 06/20/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 06/20/2019
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb discusses tonight's NBA draft while comparing Zion Williamson to past greats. Doug always explains why it might be hard for Kevin Durant to leave the Golden State Warriors. Kevin O'Connor from the Ringer stops by to talk NBA draft and rumors. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
